Interface ElementQueryMethods<E extends Element>

All Superinterfaces:
IsElement<E>
All Known Implementing Classes:
HTMLContainerBuilder, HTMLElementBuilder, HTMLInputElementBuilder, HTMLSelectElementBuilder, HTMLTextAreaElementBuilder, Link, MathMLContainerMethods, MathMLElementBuilder, SVGContainerBuilder, SVGElementBuilder
public interface ElementQueryMethods<E extends Element> extends IsElement<E>
Provides methods and default implementations for finding elements. 

By selector = By.element("a").and(By.attribute("href", STARTS_WITH, "https://"));
for (HTMLElement element : body().querySelectorAll(selector)) {
    a(element).css("external");
}

    closest(By selector)
    Finds the closest HTML element for the given selector.

    Finds a single HTML element for the given selector.
    default Iterable<HTMLElement>
    querySelectorAll(By selector)
    Finds all HTML elements for the given selector.
